title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as 

the Building Control 

(Commencement Notices) (Construction Resumption) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited building control (commencement notices) (construction resumption) regulation 2021

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Principal Regulations” means Building Control Regulations 1997 (S. I. No. 
496 of 1997); 

“valid” in relation to a commencement notice given under article 8 of the 
Principal Regulations, means where the notice having been received by the 
building control authority concerned, the authority considers in accordance 
with article 10 of the Principal Regulations that it complies with the 
requirements of article 9 of those Regulations.
text_norm: 2 regulation - principal regulation mean building control regulation 1997 (s i no 496 1997) valid relation commencement notice given article 8 principal regulation mean notice received building control authority concerned authority considers accordance article 10 principal regulation complies requirement article 9 regulation

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: 3. Subject to these Regulations, where a person has given to a building
text_raw:
3. Subject to these Regulations, where a person has given to a building 
control authority a commencement notice under article 8 of the Principal 
Regulations during the period from 3 December 2020 to 19 April 2021 and the 
notice is valid, the period of time referred to in that article within which to give 
the notice does not apply, but the works or the material change of use to which 
the commencement notice relates may, subject to any restrictions or 
prohibitions in regulations made under section 31A of the Health Act 1947 
(No. 28 of 1947), commence not later than 14 days after 4 May 2021.
text_norm: 3 subject regulation person given building control authority commencement notice article 8 principal regulation period 3 december 2020 19 april 2021 notice valid period time referred article within give notice apply work material change use commencement notice relates may subject restriction prohibition regulation made section 31a health act 1947 (no 28 1947) commence later 14 day 4 may 2021

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: 4. Regulation 3 does not apply to a notice under article 8 of the Principal
text_raw:
4. Regulation 3 does not apply to a notice under article 8 of the Principal 
in respect of a residential construction project or 
Regulations given 
construction activity relating to early learning and childcare or school aged 
childcare services.
text_norm: 4 regulation 3 apply notice article 8 principal respect residential construction project regulation given construction activity relating early learning childcare school aged childcare service

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: 5. Regulation 3 applies to works or a material change of use referred to in
text_raw:
5. Regulation 3 applies to works or a material change of use referred to in 
that Regulation which have commenced on or after 4 May 2021 but before the 
making of these Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [214] 3 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 5 May 2021 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of these Regulations is to facilitate the prompt commencement, as 
a result of the further lifting of Covid restrictions, of the remainder of 
construction projects (i.e. all construction projects other than residential 
construction projects or construction activity relating to early learning and 
childcare or school aged childcare services) for which a valid commencement 
notice, submitted between 3 December 2020 and 19 April 2021, relates. The 
Regulations allow a person commence these without submitting a new 
commencement notice, provided that they commence not later than 18 May
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation) purpose regulation facilitate prompt commencement result lifting covid restriction remainder construction project (i.e construction project residential construction project construction activity relating early learning childcare school aged childcare services) valid commencement notice submitted 3 december 2020 19 april 2021 relates regulation allow person commence without submitting new commencement notice provided commence later 18 may

title: section 6 of the Building Control Act 1990 (No. 3 of 1990) (as adapted by the
heading: Similar measures were provided for residential construction projects and
text_raw:
2021. 

Similar measures were provided for residential construction projects and 
construction activity relating to early learning and childcare or school aged 
childcare services 
the Building Control (Commencement Notices) 
(Residential and Childcare Services Construction) Regulations 2021 (S. I. No. 
156 of 2021).
